_generated: Generated by SweetTooth, do not edit
description:
Makes the title of the window to display its full content when the mouse hovers over the window, in the activities view.

It causes the ellipsized text to show by making the label bigger, with an animation. So you might not even see an improvement, unless you use many windows.

For a similar feature on the Applications Overview see:
https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/416/applications-overview-tooltip/
name: Display Full Window Title
